timestamp.description: Time that the IP was probed in UTC+0

ip.description: The IP address of the device in question

protocol.description: Protocol that the ADB response came on (always TCP)

port.description: Port that the ADB response came from (5555/TCP)

hostname.description: Reverse DNS name of the device in question

asn.description: ASN of where the device in question resides

geo.description: Country where the device in question resides

region.description: State / Province / Administrative region where the device in question resides

city.description: City in which the device in question resides

naics.description: North American Industry Classification System Code

name.description: The device's internal codename as defined by the vendor (usually)

device.description: Also the device's codename, may be the same as the 'name' field

features.description: Specific bits of the code that the device is advertising
